original_text: One day, when it was Herod's birthday, he asked people to come to a special meal. The daughter of Herodias danced in front of him and his visitors. Her dance caused Herod to become very happy.
korean_text: 마침 헤롯의 생일이 되어 헤로디아의 딸이 연석 가운데서 춤을 추어 헤롯을 기쁘게 하니

sentences.original_text: One day, when it was Herod's birthday
he asked people to come to a special meal
The daughter of Herodias danced in front of him
sentences.korean_translation: 헤로디아의 딸이 그의 앞에서 춤을 추었습니다

sentences.original_text: Her dance caused Herod to become very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 춤은 헤롯을 매우 기쁘게 만들었습니다
